page.title: 09POETRY
page.content: *** TUESDAY 18th JUNE *** When in our square/ Which was called D, It started to rain/ And got windy. We all put cagoules on/ To shelter from the rain,/ And when the rain had gone, Took them off again. Lots of work,/ Was done that day, We all had answers to find,/ And no time to play. We interviewed people,/ From different places,/ Asked them questions,/ and saw many new faces. $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ *** ON THE 18th OF JUNE *** On the 18th of June we walked to our square. We had lots of fun everywhere./We wrote our information down in a book. But after that we still had to look. We had to make notes on where we had been./We had to make sketches of what we had seen.
